name: Straight Outta Birbton
description:
Ready to hit 'em up? This is a 90's hip hop based brawler where the two coast clash in a battle to see who is the best rapper. Play as 2Duck or Notorius B.I.R.B. in this couch multiplayer, smashing your friends to space and beyond.

CONTROLS (CONTROLLER):

A: Jump (double jump)

RB: bat (hold to charge it for more damage)

LEFT JOYSTICK: movement

RIGHT JOYSTICK: aim
